toasts.moveToPreviousDescription: Move this and previous utterances to the previous segment?
toasts.moveToNextDescription: Move this and following utterances to the next segment?
toasts.highlightCreatedDescription: Highlight started with this utterance. Add more utterances to build your highlight.
toasts.createHighlightError: Failed to create highlight. Please try again.
toasts.editError: Failed to save changes. Please try again.

unverifiedBanner.title: Automatic Transcript
unverifiedBanner.description: This transcript was automatically generated and may contain errors. It is being reviewed and will be updated within 48 hours of the meeting.

addUtterance.tooltip: Add a new utterance at the end of this segment
